title: 如何让玩家执行执行某一个指令但是要付钱
author: Taku
txt_content: 服务器想开通自助修装备。如何设置输入并且执行/fix指令要付钱

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 jiuerd 于 2014-6-2 10:45 编辑 

./plugings/essentials/config.yml
command-costs:
  # /example costs $1000 PER USE
  #example: 1000
  # /kit tools costs $1500 PER USE
  #kit-tools: 1500
